title: This is UniversityPlenty6960,  Pls DM me
content: Sy for calling out, I lost my acc.

comments.body:
Hey, Ik this isnt how I should be posting. I urgently need help from someone who had dmed me on my old account , which I have lost access to.  
I'm not able to locate the person, so I had to make a post to get their attention.

I'm very sorry and please let the post be.
Not able to remember it entirely
